data.title: Yeysk climate: Average Temperature by month, Yeysk water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Yeysk

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Yeysk

>>average temperature by month Yeysk

>>Weather Yeysk

>>Water temperature Yeysk

The climatic conditions in Yeysk are characterized by a warm and temperate atmosphere. The precipitation levels in the city of Yeysk are noteworthy, as there is a considerable amount of rainfall even during months that typically experience dry weather. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification identifies this particular weather pattern as belonging to the category of Cfa. The mean temperature prevailing in the city of Yeysk is recorded as 12.0 °C | 53.6 °F, according to statistical data. Precipitation here is about 590 mm | 23.2 inch per year.

Yeysk is in the northern hemisphere. Its north to the equator line The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The months that constitute this season are referred to as June, July, August, September. The optimal period to plan a visit would be during the months of July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Yeysk

The month characterized by the lowest precipitation levels is July, exhibiting a mere 37 mm | 1.5 inch of rainfall. On average, the highest amount of rainfall occurs during June with a mean value of 61 mm | 2.4 inch.

average temperature by month Yeysk

On average, the month of July experiences the highest temperature with an average value of 25.4 °C | 77.7 °F. On average, the month of January is considered to be the coldest time of year with temperatures averaging at around -0.6 °C | 30.9 °F.

Yeysk weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Yeysk

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In the region of Yeysk, it has been observed that July is the month which experiences maximum daily sunshine hours, with an average duration of approximately 13.29. The total number of sunlit hours during this period amounts to a staggering sum of about 412.

The location of Yeysk experiences the least amount of daily sunshine hours during January, with an average duration of only 2.89. The total number of sunlight hours recorded in this month is equal to 89.57.

It has been estimated that the total annual sunshine duration in Yeysk is approximately 3009.08 hours. This translates to an average monthly value of roughly 98.67 hours for each month, on a consistent basis.

Water temperature Yeysk(Sea of Azov)

Max. Water temperature °C (°F) Avg. Water Temperature °C (°F) Min. Water Temperature °C (°F)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

On an annual basis, the average water temperature in Yeysk located within Sea of Azov, is approximately 12.80°C | 55.04°F.

The month of January experiences the most frigid water temperatures, with a minimum range of approximately 2.10°C | 35.78°F. Conversely, during July, the average maximum temperature reaches around 25.80°C | 78.44°F.

The water temperature is at its highest around July 30 when 25.80°C | 78.44°F is reached. The lowest value is around January 14 when 2.10°C | 35.78°F is recorded.

The closest body of water in proximity to Yeysk is the Sea of Azov.

Airport close to Yeysk

The closest Airports of Yeysk are: Rostov-on-Don Airport (ROV) 126.76km,Krasnodar International Airport (KRR) 197.97km,Anapa Airport (AAQ) 214.66km

You can reach Yeysk from this Cities by Plane: Athens (ATH), Kyiv (KBP), Minsk (MSQ), Yekaterinburg (SVX), Novosibirsk (OVB), Samara (KUF), Volgograd (VOG), Voronezh (VOZ), Bishkek (FRU), Tashkent (TAS), Dushanbe (DYU), Paphos (PFO), Dubai (DXB), Sochi (AER), Thessaloniki (SKG), Budapest (BUD), Yerevan (EVN), Saint Petersburg (LED), Krasnoyarsk (KJA), Makhachkala (MCX)
